page.title: 06LAW AND ORDER
page.content: There is little serious crime in the area of our block. Most offences are minor civil violations - allowing cattle to stray onto the highway, speeding, etc. There are burglaries in the area due to the high income level of many residents but no high incidence of criminal activity. The area is policed by a community policeman who operates from Saltash Police Station. He patrols his beat by car. Fire Brigade - The nearest fire service is at Saltash. For serious incidents brigades are called in from both Callington and Plymouth. Ambulance - The nearest service is at Saltash. For serious incidents both Callington and Plymouth services would respond.
